play2:testCompile

Full name:

com.google.code.play2-maven-plugin:play2-maven-plugin:1.0.0-alpha1:testCompile

Description:

...

Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven project to be executed.
  • Requires dependency resolution of artifacts in scope: test.
  • Since version: 1.0.0.

Optional Parameters

Name Type Since Description
testCompileSkip boolean 1.0.0 Set this to 'true' to bypass compilation of test sources. Its use is NOT RECOMMENDED, but quite convenient on occasion.
User property is: maven.test.skip.

Parameter Details

testCompileSkip:

Set this to 'true' to bypass compilation of test sources. Its use is NOT RECOMMENDED, but quite convenient on occasion.
  • Type: boolean
  • Since: 1.0.0
  • Required: No
  • User Property: maven.test.skip
